question: Which country's UNESCO World Heritage Site is "Palace of Sans-Souci"?
explanation: Haiti's UNESCO World Heritage Site is "Palace of Sans-Souci". The Palace of Sans-Souci was the principal royal residence of Henry I, king of Haiti, better known as Henri Christophe. It is located in the town of Milot, northeast of the Citadelle Laferri√®re, and southwest of the Three Bays Protected Area.
